she usually has. "I got it!" She took out a can of pink hair dye and sprayed it to make three thick pink stripes on the
front. She then placed two star shaped hair pins on one of the stripes as a memento of that girl who helped her release
her love of diapers. "Perfect. Look out world Gwen the new Phoenix is coming to take you on. Lock up your daughters
because nobody is safe. I bring the fire baby!" She was so glad that nobody heard that because she would die of
embarrassment.

After that she placed on a new fresh diaper, her work uniform, and a short skirt that had her diaper barely sticking out
ever so slightly. Even though she was in no rush she always had light breakfasts usually just a bagel or sometimes
a Poptart. She really had to teach herself to cook better one of these days. Oh well she figured since she practically
ran on positive energy anyway. After packing a few diapers in her purse she was ready to leave for the day with her
nostrils breathing in the fresh air of a brand new day.

Sitting on a porch chair was her next door neighbor Ms. Treeborn. She is a middle aged woman who used to be friends
with Gwen's former boss Mr. Phoenix. She helped convince the landlord to get her a really good deal and keep things
hush hush on certain background checks. Despite being a bit of a nosy neighbor she really is a nice person.

Ms. Treeborn: "Ah Gwendolyn, lovely morning it is, quite fine."
Gwen: "Hello Ms. Treeborn. It is quite fine. It is my first day with my brand new staff and I couldn't be happier."

Ms. Treeborn: "That's good to hear." She lifts Gwen's skirt up to reveal her diaper. "And it looks like you're dry."
"What the hell?!" Gwen shouted as she dragged it back down. Her face was quite red as she felt like a victim
of some guy who gets off on flipping girl's skirts. "Who does that?!"

Ms. Treeborn: "Oh pish-posh. I was checking to see if you needed a change. Besides we're both girls and
nothing to be ashamed about."

Gwen said sarcastically: "Yeah I'll be sure to tell you if I wet myself by accident."
Ms. Treeborn: "Splendid. Now how about you join me for tea."

Gwen looks at her watch: "Um sure."
They walk inside the house as Ms. Treeborn pours her a cup of tea. Gwen wasn't the biggest fan of tea but she always
drank it anyway.

Ms. Treeborn: "I'm surprised you decided to wear a skirt today. You looked so cute waddling around with that diaper
of yours without the skirt. I hadn't changed a diaper since my own kids, bless their hearts."

Gwen: "Yeah, you didn't seem that surprised to see me like that two days ago."
Ms. Treeborn: "I guessed quite some time ago.

Gwen: "Come on! Did everybody know?"
Ms. Treeborn: "I figured out when you occasionally brought diapers back from work. I also noticed them sticking out of your trash can
shortly after when you invited me over. You really shouldn't leave them out like that because they start to smell."

Gwen blushes: "I've recently invested in a diaper genie."
Ms. Treeborn: "Excellent! I've gotten one myself for the next time you come to me for a change."

Gwen: "Yeah about that. I'm just going to change them myself when I need to."
Ms. Treeborn felt upset: "Oh I see. It's like my kids all over again, feeling too embarrassed to spend time with me."

Gwen: "No no. It's not you, it's me. I'm actually a diaper lover, not an adult baby. I respect the hell out of those people but
I prefer to still keep my independence while wearing my diapers as a fashion choice. Except in well you know, but where am
I going to find the right girl who's into that."

Ms. Treeborn: "Oh you'll find someone. Phoenix Pharmacy has started dozens of fads in this town alone. If anyone could get
the whole town wearing diapers again like they were bikinis I'm sure it would be you."

"Wow." Gwen though nearly drooling. She took a sip of tea to hide it.

Ms. Treeborn: "Still it might not be the best time given the weird night life. I heard there is some mad street tough roaming
around smashing mail boxes. "Gwen spits out her tea upon hearing that.

Gwen: "What!? Was there a description of the face?"

Ms. Treeborn: "Gwen you made a mess. You shouldn't chug tea or else you'll burn your tongue. They say that happened to that
one magician in Las Vegas." She takes out a hanker chief and begins wiping Gwen off. "Anyway that is a big no-no. The person
was wearing a biker helmet. The darnest thing especially in this day and age. Why, do you know about this?"

Gwen lied: "No."
Ms. Treeborn: "There all clean. Oh my look at the time. We wouldn't want you to be late to work."
Gwen giggled: "Heh. We're open 24/7. I'm never late."

She finished her tea and headed out to work.
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Use the toilet

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
Miki was a modern day soccer mom taking care of her 4 girls. A few months ago she had been involved with something
supernatural known as nightmares that had made her feel more alive than she ever felt in her life. Being able to fight
demons inside the dream world to save her daughters and school mates really seemed more exciting than cooking
school lunches. Strangely enough the thing she missed most of all was her armor, or better yet the diapers she had to
wear. It felt so great to wear them, but ever since their final battle in the dream world she just never had the chance to.
Of course it wasn't like she could wear them in real life, she had responsibilities. It made her feel like a hole was left in
her life. Of course until she say her kids safe and sound each morning did she feel reassured.

Miki: "Kids come right down so I can drive you to school!"

**
Meanwhile, Gwen was walking her normal path to work. She notices something on the ground.
Gwen: "Ooo a quarter." She bends down to pick it up showing off her diaper in full view.

At the same time Miki was driving at the side of the road carpooling her kids. It was only for a moment but she knew
what she saw. It was a diaper.

Miki thinks: "What the heck?"

Does Miki pursue or not

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
You've reached your high school with everything you need for the day. You were hoping to bump into Beth
right now, but couldn't find her anywhere. After going through security her phone started to ring. It had a text
on it.
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: You

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
You looked down at your phone to read it from one of the girls. It was from Sara.
The text read.

Location: Your homeroom class
Deadline: Start of class

Pick a spot, lift your skirt, and start peeing.

You were shocked. During the weekend when Sara made you go outside public it was usually in front of people
whom didn't know you. The idea of anyone seeing you just circulated in your mind. You frantically text a
reply back stating that people will see you and would like get in trouble with the teacher.

Sara sends a text back quickly.

Don't care. Just do it or else.

Your bus made it here earlier than others and most high schoolers do tend to mingle in the hallways before
going to homeroom. Realizing that you didn't have a lot of time you ran as fast as you could to your homeroom
class on the second floor. You noticed that no one was inside except for your teacher, the worst possible person.

How will you proceed?
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Dare 6

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
You think with common sense: "No way I'm just whipping it out in front of the teacher. And yes I
know I thought that. Think Star think!" You pace around thinking of something to do to get the
teacher out without placing attention on yourself.

You rush towards a stairway that you know nobody hangs out in. Near the edge you see
a fire alarm that still functioned and had no guards around it.

You reach out than retrack your hand.
You: "What am I doing? I can't commit a felony just because I'm wearing a diaper. There must be an
alternative. Yeah, just expect Sara to miraculously make me think like a baby again. ... Shit I'm not
ready for that." You pull the fire alarm. The fire sirens go off in a field of glory.

"Everyone get outside!!" Your teacher directed leaving the classroom. This was your opportunity.
"Yes" you whisper. Post congratulation you wipe your prints off of the fire alarm before rushing into the
classroom. After looking around consistently to make sure no one could possibly see it and placing on a paper bag
as a disguise you pull your skirt up to show off the diaper to the non-existent classroom.

...Nothing happened.
You panic as the urge isn't quite there yet.

You: "Why now of all times? I really need to pee."
After a few moments a small stream started to pour into the diaper. The warm flow quickly increases till it nearly fills
the entire front. Your mission was complete and now you just have to join anyone on the outside.

But did anyone see you wet yourself?

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
Click! Click!
"Woah! Who is the daredevil here?" Gabby thinks taking pictures of you peeing your diaper.
She is unable to see your face due to the bag and you never had a relationship before
anyway.

Gabby: "First my boss, now this strange diapered vigilant. I bet I could make this front
page of the school paper. No, Gwen would fire me given her fascination with those padded things
if I slandered someone for wearing them. Hmm as long as it is a slander peace. That looks
really familiar to the diapers Phoenix Pharmacy sells. If I do more research I could bring in
more customers to work, maybe even get an internship at the news station. Reminds me of that
one time uncle Franco..dear god it's loud." The sound of the fire alarm was really irritating her and
luckily the noise was drowning her voice so you couldn't hear her.

She rushes away before you would have the chance to notice her.

**
You finally finished peeing to the point you could finally drop your skirt. You grab the diapered
crotch and squeezed to inspect the damage. There wasn't a lot and wasn't even squishy, but it was
sure to accumulate over the course of the morning if the girls had anything to say about that. Of course
now was not the time to be touching yourself given the urgency of the crime you committed. If you
aren't outside soon then you're bound to get a detention.

As you tore off the bag on your head you rushed outside you can still feel the warm diaper pushing
against your vagina. By the time you arrived you were out of breath when they called your name.

You: "Huff. Here! Wheeze."
Beth: "Star?"

You: "Beth?"
You and Beth at the same time: "Oh thank christ you're okay!!" You both give each other a bear hug
"Ever since the mall yesterday I haven't been able to escape my mom. But enough about me
I'm just glad you made it out in one piece." She accidentally feels your diaper
"You're still wearing that." You nod silently.

You too catch up since the event at the mall excluding the part about hypnotism. You then proceed
to have a pretty normal homeroom without incident. Immediately after class you receive a phone call
from Sara again.

What are the contents?
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Gabby

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
Sara: "I see Baby-Doll had a very interesting morning. I sure hope that diapee doesn't leak."

You: "Look I did your dare. Just leave me in peace while I'm at school."
Sara: "But if you don't play the game then you'll never get your revenge."

You: "Okay, but make it quick. My next class will start soon."
Sara: "Don't worry. It'll be quick. On the third floor next to the janitor's closet is a small booth. Nobody
ever goes there. I want you to go there."

You: "And what do I do there."
Sara giggles: "Why confess your sins of course. After every dare, if you want to just go there and admit what you did."

You: "That is the opposite of what I am trying to do."
Sara: "Struggle all you want, but I know you're dying to let loose about this. It excites you. It's a confessional so as long as
you're smart nobody will know it is you. For every confession I'll give you one dare point. I want you to go there for now to
understand where it is. Whether anything happens is up to you."

Sara hangs up the phone leaving you with little time to choose.
Will you confess?
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Special Challenge

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
You arrive at the confession booth. There were two booths that appeared to have different entrances
to the other. You looked around to see that no one was around so you snuck inside. The place
looked poorly made and covered in dust. For now it was completely silent.

"Um is anyone there?" a voice came from the other booth that you jump up hitting your head.
"Ouch!" You whine.

The voice: "Um I got a note telling me to come here. Were you the one who sent it?"

You: "No. I was also told to come here. How did you get here?"
The voice: "There was a map on the note that led me here. Maybe we should head back to class."

You: "No!! We came her for a reason. We might as well you know, talk."
The voice: "Um okay. So what do you want to talk about?"

"Well..." You hesitate to say it. As you look at you wet diaper peeking out of your skirt you weight the risk
of doing this. What happens next could outline the rest of your high school experience. You could imagine
being like Gwen that nice store manager who helped you the other day who actually enjoys this or at least
the diaper wearing part of it. For now you pull up your skirt that would reveal your diaper to no one. You then
took a deep breath and just let it out.

You: "Have you ever done something inappropriate in class?"
The voice: "Well maybe doodle now and then. Nothing big. Is this being recorded?"

You: "No. At least I hope not. This morning I went straight to homeroom, lifted up my skirt, and started
peeing. And then I just left the room like nothing happened. By god I wish nobody saw me."

The voice: "Wait what?! Who the hell are you?!! Why would you do that?" The first bell rang marking only
two minutes left until the next class.

"It was a dare" You said in a witty banter before pulling your skirt down and high tailing it out of the confessional
since you fulfilled the requirements that Sara left you. The girl in the other booth was confused about what happened
but knew that she also had to get back to class. During the talk your voice was filtered and gave her a slight headache
that made her feel like her head was probed. It made her shiver based on memories from months back where she was
truly helpless and there was only darkness. A nightmare filled with corruption.

The girl slow walked towards her classroom filled with more girls than boys. It was becoming quite a fad for people to
dye their hair these days including blue, pink, purple and green. There was know a sharp pain in her bladder. She
really should have gone to the bathroom before leaving. She sat down and waited for the professor to arrive.

Ten minutes into class her need to pee increased and she felt a little feverish. She felt like she was losing awareness
of her surroundings.

Teacher: "Ms. Yu, could you please come to the front to answer the next question on the board."
All of a sudden the girl's legs pulled up on their own. Once stood up she proceeded to lift her skirt up and began peeing.
The class stood there in shock as they had a full view of her panties soaking up from urine, dripping down her legs, and
forming a puddle underneath her feet. Unlike your dare everybody saw this and would be talking about it for days to come.

Teacher shouting: "What is the meaning of this?!!!"
The girl drops her skirt: "It's just a dare." She then passed out falling down on the ground as her classmates tried to
help her. This game was only just beginning.

There are several characters involved today.
Where will the story take place next?

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Outside of school

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
Rewind back an hour to Sara's house.
Shannon is on her own without the ability to move her legs. When the girls said that they hired a babysitter
to look after her her first instinct was to hide.

"Got to hide" Shannon panted while crawling as fast as she could. It took all of her effort to lift herself up
the stairs. She was feeling weak. "I need to go to the gym."

As much as she was interested in hiding, she had no idea where to go.
Shannon: "The girls must have cameras all over the place."

She ends up crawling towards a large room in this huge mansion that she didn't have a chance to go
into yet. It was a library. This was one of the few rooms that were not locked.

"Come on just need to reach it" Shannon struggles with as she tries to reach the handlebar with her
arm extended up. "I never knew the paralyzed had it this rough. When this is over maybe I should
look into more volunteer work." She was able to pull down the handlebar to open up the door. Shannon
pushed the door in and slowly crawled in. The thick diaper created a loud crinkle even through the
itchy onesie.

The library was huge with rows and rows of books. The Everests were huge book collectors with
old books in history, science, and maybe even the occult.

At a coffee table there was a regular water bottle that was unused. With the extensive stress
Shannon crawled towards it and begins chugging it greedily. She knew that it would end up in
her diaper eventually, but she was too thirsty right now to care. She lifted herself to a chair to
relax. It was a nice room. It really made Shannon consider that she wanted a high paying job
in the near future. It wasn't like she was getting paid for this job anyway.

Shannon pondered: "Hmm. I think Sara said she got weird powers a few months ago. I wonder if she
read it here." She looks around the library for any weird books. There were a few strange looking books
that appeared to have a weird aura. They caught her interests right away. Unfortunately they were on the
top shelf and hard to reach. It would be more likely to trip and break a few bones in a doomed attempt to
reach them. Then Shannon would really be a paraplegic.

Shannon: "Well this babysitter might not come in here. Might as well find something to read." She reached
for the nearest magazine. "Hmm Scarlet Lemon is supposed to be coming her next week. I'm sure Star will
enjoy that. Oh there's also an ad for that pharmacy from the other day. Really don't want to go there again."

She felt a slight sting in her abdomen.
"Eer." She complained palming her forehead to ease a small headache. Apparently drugs and her do not
mix well. She was feeling bad all over. Except for butt ironically. The bulk of the diaper helped keep it
comfortable. The seat helped too. This might be the first time since she got to this hell hole that she could
truly relax. There were no girls to torment her.

Shannon: "I might as well relax. Groan. I need to pee again." Without much thought she calmed down and
released her floodgates as she began peeing. She lowers her eyebrows with the disappointment in herself
with how easy this was to do now and how she did this with little disregard for how infantile it is.

Shannon's cheeks blush with feeling the warm pee pour in. She had to go a lot more than she thought.
Inside the onesie the diaper continuously expanded till the entire front was soaked. Figuring that no one
was watching at the moment she grabbed the front of diaper to feel the squishiness.

Shannon: "I bet Sara's getting a turn on from this. Little kid trying to work out her personal insecurities
into some sadist fetish on anyone older than her. I don't see it though. I wonder who would possible do this
by choice."

Suddenly a intercom turns on with a prerecorded message.
Sara: "Hello Shannon. I was thinking that while you wait for your babysitter to arrive you might get bored.
What better way to pass the time than to continue our little game."

Shannon to no one. "Oh go to hell!"
Sara intercom continuing: "You must miss your family. I know you sleep in the same room as your sister, but
what about your mommy and daddy. In five minutes your mom is going to skype to a computer set up in the living
room. There is a post it note listing your options during the exchange. Just a reminder be a second late to log
in, I'm sure your mommy will love to see a photo of you having one of your accidents. Have fun! :)"
The message ends.

Shannon: "Crap! She crawls out as fast as her arms can move her. The hardest part was when she reached
the stairs. "I haven't done this since I was a kid." She positioned herself into a sitting position with her
feet laying on the stairs. With a little push she started butt sledding down the stairs with her diaper easing
the impact on her rump. When she fell down to the floor she collapsed plank style on her belly. The glasses
on her head flew off from impact.

"Dang it!" She said frantically looking for them. Her vision wasn't that bad without them, but not good enough
to see where they had landed. She didn't have anytime anyway. She crawled her way towards the laptop in the
living room. Just then an epiphany sparked in her mind. Her parents would see her like this. In order to hide the
childish clothing on her she grabbed a few blankets and wrapped them around her. She carefully positioned herself
on the coach before signing in the nick of time.

Shannon: "Now where is that list." She found a post it note with the options that she had.

Truth: Tell your mommy that you are wearing a diaper. That should be fun.
Dare: Poop your diaper during the chat. We left a laxative granola bar to make it easier. ;)

There are only 10 seconds left. What will Shannon do?
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Shannon

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
"I'm not going to make the same mistake as sis" Shannon said before taking a bite of the granola bar. The effects
might take some time to take full effect.

Just then the monitor opened to show your and Shannon's mother. All right time to get into business.

Your mother: "Hello, is this working? Hello."

Shannon: "Hi mom."
Your mother: "Shannon? Good heavens you're mummified in blankets."

Shannon: "I have a small cold. Cough." That cough was to make it more believable.

Your mother: "You too. I swear its an epidemic around here. Your father got sick too and resting it off. Maybe I
should call someone to help you out."

Shannon objects: "No! I'm handling it well. Everyone was just sent to school and everything is in order. You
can trust me to get over it easily."

Your mother: "Hmph. I expect nothing less. If your sister wants to act like a baby then she deserves to be treated
like a baby. I swear you embrace more responsibility than her."

Shannon thinks: "If only you knew." Her mother had always been a strict parent with rarely any middle ground.
She could only imagine what she would do if she was her right now.

Your mother: "I'm sorry that I had to place the burden onto you. There was no one else available right now.
It must be awkward to change your sister's diapers at her age."

Shannon: "Well size wise it feels weird. But honestly I think she's gotten used to it."
Your mother: "How so?"

Shannon improvises: "Well um, this morning when I came to her room to wake her up I think I saw her
squat to poop herself."

Your mother: "She did what?"

Shannon: "Yeah I guess Star figured that since she would get changed before school she might as well
do it early anyway. I certainly changed a messy diaper that morning."

Your mother: "What was the look on her face when she did it?"
Shannon: "Huh?"

Your mother: "The look on your face when she did it. Did it show deviant intent? It looks pretty obvious."
Shannon: "I'm not sure. It was pretty dark and I only arrived to see Star finish the deed."

Your mother: "Well you keep me updated on her behavior. That girl is in serious trouble when we get back."
Shannon: "Will do." There are so many things that she would freak out about later. Like sneaking back home
to burn her and Star's panties. That is something that will be hard to explain in a few weeks.
Of course that is still a few week away thank god for that.

Your mother: "Well you seem to be doing well on that. Oh I almost forgot to mention. I found a few more
job websites for you to look at. You could use the time to go over them and send a few resumes out.
After all you aren't getting any younger."

Shannon think: "Great this shit again. Oh no." Her abdomen was in pain again. The laxatives and
sickness combined were kicking in. "It is kicking in. Might as well get it over with." Right now your
mother's pretentious words were blurred out with your trying to concentrate. Almost instantly
diarrhea filled your diaper in a meshy form. Half of it felt liquidity as it came out. Within thirty seconds
Shannon had completed the dirty deed that raised her sitting height and made the room smell foul.

Your mother: "Shannon are you okay? You've been squinting your eyes and biting your lip for
thirty seconds."

Shannon: "Why would you think tha..at?!" I little more poop burst out.
Your mother: "Wait I've seen this before. Did you poop yourself? My god first your sister now you.
I swear you kids are the most people immature people in the world. I nag and nag and nothing seems
to work..."

Shannon's world feels like it is shaking. Your mother had no proof but she rarely changed her mind
about anything, even when she was sure that Yuna killed Yuki's parents in the anime Future Diary.
Even when they are killed by other people on screen. The whole thing was making her feel naucious
from stress. In fact it only took a second to process what was coming and immediately grabbed a
small trash can next to her and began hurling.

Shannon: "Bwaaah!!"
Your mother sees the show and becomes apologetic. "Oh baby I'm so sorry. You had that work and
I assumed the worse. I won't keep you long. You try and get better. Remember to not overwork
yourself." The skype call ends with a crisis sort of averted. Remember hip young people, never
skype your mommy in a poopy diaper.

Shannon collapses on the floor from exhaustion. She was not feeling well right now. Now was
not a good time to be sick.

Shannon groans: "I stink. Bwahh!!" She hurls again in the trash can. It was basically her puke bin
now. It must have been the onesee migrating the stink to the neck whole. "That's it." She fumbles
with the outfit's zipper to take the ridiculous thing off. She threw the thing off until she was in a childish
t - shirt and very messy diaper.

Just then there was a knock on the door. Shannon just stood there and hoped they would just go away.
Then there was a rustling of keys being placed into the door that were working. The door knob was
slowly turning.

Shannon ended up farting before releasing another wave of poop into the diaper where a noticable
brown spot was showing. This must have been the babysitter that Sara had mentioned.

Do we know this person?
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Dare 4

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Around 18 to 24

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
The door opened and in came a young woman in her early twenties.
She had light brown hair and hazel eyes. She had a slim physique that matched well with
her uniform. The uniform was a a white tunic like thing with multiple pocket patches full of
knick-knacks. She had tight navy blue pants to posture her in what felt like a military trained
personnel. The key part of her outfit was a red barrette with a name tag pinned to it saying
Matsuri Hiiragi.

"Shannon. Okay little one. I hope you're ready for a fun filled day just the two of us." Matsuri
said before locking eyes at Shannon on the floor with an exposed and plainly used diaper.

Shannon speechless: "..."
Matsuri speechless: "..."

Time seemed to be still for these very confused individuals. Well Shannon was more scared
than confused. Mostly because of yesterday.

Shannon though: "These people again!!?" Yesterday she and you met an cult like organization
named Diaper Sitter Daycare and Friends in a toy store. Those kooks harassed the two of you
just for being in diapers.

Nightmarish Octavia: "You're mine little bebe."

Shannon: "How does Sara even know these people?! And I bet she's younger than me.
Oh no she's from the same college that I went too." She was focusing on Matsuri's college ring
that matched the one that Shannon left at home. "No no no. She's going to post pictures of me
like this on the college website. I'll be stuck some helpless baby girl forever!!

Meanwhile Matsuri was panicking internally.

Matsuri: "Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!" She was having a mental breakdown.
A few months ago there was an epidemic where people were in comas just from falling asleep.
Statistics showed that around 3,341 people were affected in the state only. Matsuri was one of the
victims. People had vague recollections of what they dreamed during that time, but Matsuri
remembered the nightmare very vividly.

Matsuri had been diapered for two weeks and forced to walk time as people she knew and loved
humiliated her. Every time she messed herself her three siblings would spank, tease, and even
bite her. It was hell.

Near the end of the sickness she had one last dream of being saved by her mom Miki, her younger
siblings and a few of their friends. Strangely enough all of them were in diapers too. It was after
that dream that she finally woke up along with her sister Tsukasa. Her mom explained that they
were infected by some otherworldly being known as corruptions that were the cause of the
nightmarish epidemic. Matsuri still didn't fully understand it to today, but apparently everyone was
retired from that gig.

For the next couple of weeks Matsuri needed to wear diapers to regain her bladder control. As
embarrassing as it was, she was still around people who loved and supported her for it. It didn't
take long for the family to be diaper free and for life to get back to how it used to be.

Except things were not the same. While physically healed the physiological scars remained.
She was now easily intimidated by people taller than her. It made it feel like they would
sporadically slam her to the ground, strip her, and leave her in nothing but a diaper. It
had gotten so bad that she couldn't even leave the house.

Until one day her mom came up to her.
Miki: "Matsuri it's time you leave the house and take charge of your life again."

Matsuri: "Why? I have the semester off on sabbatical. Ha ha ha. I have food, water, a toilet. I'm
all set. Ha ha ha ha." She hadn't been getting a lot of sleep lately. She wondered how her sister
Tsukasa was able to handle it so well."

Miki gives her middle child a hug. "It's okay dear. I promise the nightmare is gone for good.
You need your rest. But you need to move on with your life. Me and your sisters are here
with you every step of the way.

"Okay." Matsuri said before falling asleep on her mother's lap.
Over the next couple of months was meant to be very therapeutic for Matsuri. Her older sister
Inori traveled around town a lot, sometimes even holding her hand.

"Who's that energetic woman over there?" Matsuri asked Inori during a charity event at the church
where Inori was an assistant preacher.

Inori: "That is Gwen. I think she's the daughter of the owner of that really huge pharmacy. You
really need to come to church more often."

Matsuri: "She dyes her hair just like mom."
Inori: "Mom dyes her hair?"

Of course the hard part was more to exposure therapy. Since there was no way that Matsuri
was ever going to wear a diaper again the next best thing would be to change babies diapers
She helped Inori with that with the churches nursery. Matsuri had gotten used to it and for a
time she felt cured of her insecurity.

However, nursery and babysitting jobs regarding babies had started to run dry leaving Matsuri
now a little empty inside. She had gotten so used to taking care of people. Without the
responsibility she felt vulnerable again. That was until fate sent a career flyer literally flying
towards her face.

Matsuri read: "Diaper Sitter Daycare and Friends. We provide to babies of all kind. There
is no diaper that we cannot change. Help wanted. Qualifications include former experience
and an iron will. Training included." She smiled at the opportunity for a part - time job.

Sadly it was far from what she expected it to be.
Corporal Tinoru: "Alright you little maggots. I expect you to be strong. I expect you to be
kind. I expect you to get the job done!!" The head caretaker was a drill sergeant from hell.
Despite the sweet old lady face and hairstyle, her body was ripped without a shred of flabby
flesh. She ruled the other members with an iron fist.

Everyone wore identical uniforms and trained for situations that seemed impossible for a normal
baby. Matsuri was never one for lectures so she may have dazed out of a couple of parts.
However, she did find it strange that there were different buildings categorized for different types
of people. And that she was trained to lift 140 pounds. Those must have been very fat babies
to make it on the list.

She only spent one day in their daycare for normal infants. This was meant to be her first day as
an official call girl babysitter. If it weren't for one little accident.

At the office there was a clerk noticing something wrong with the schedule.
Clerk: "Uh oh. I accidentally gave Matsuri the contacts meant for Octavia. God bless their souls."

Now in the present.

Matsuri thinks: "Why is there a full grown woman sitting there in a diaper?! I didn't sign up for this!
This is a trap! Oh jeese it's getting hard to breath!! O hee! O hee!"

Shannon thinks: "Oh no. She's aroused."

Psssssssss.

Matsuri: "Huh?"
The tension was broken from the sound of Shannon peeing her diaper. The yellow crotch of it
darkened in full view. It expanded outward spreading Shannon's leg's apart while still being
squished. Soon the diaper just gave away and leaked onto the carpet floor forming a foul
puddle.

Matsuri: "Did you just...?"
Shannon had never felt so helpless before. Tears began to form. She could feel the pee hit
one of her hands. She was about to wail out in shame, but ended up passing out from high fever.

Matsuri panicked a little bit not knowing whether to call a hospital. However, her contract that she
skimmed stated that she had to provide all needs including medical. If she used 911 then she would
be sued for some reason. Either way she had a passed out woman bigger than her and a huge mess
to clean up.

She felt the forehead and understood that it was a bad cold. She needed to improvise.
She reached into her nap sack in order to first.
1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.title: Clumsy

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
Matsuri pulls out a portable changing mat, baby powder, lotion, wipes, and a large
diaper with a kangaroo on it.

Matsuri: "Dang it. Dang it. Dang it." She was frantically trying to move Shannon out
of the area to get her cleaned up. But with all of her training Shannon was too heavy
for her to lift. "Why do you have to be so heavy?" The failed attempt to lift caused her to
accidentally trip on the pee puddle that hadn't fully been absorbed into the carpet.

Her face collided with Shannon's boobs.
"Ugh" Shannon moaned.

"Ugh" Matsuri moaned realized that her uniform was now covered in Shannon's pee.
Something that she would regret later.

Matsuri to an unconscious Shannon. "I'm sorry about this. I don't know you, but you seem
like an okay person. Please don't hate me for this." She beings rolling Shannon off of the carpet
onto the changing mat. "There. Now we can get you changed out of this. Our motto at Diaper
Sitters Daycare and Friends is that there is no diaper that we can't change. Although you are
certainly testing that limit."

Matsuri proceeds to strip all of Shannon's clothing and wipe her her down to remove the dirt
and carpet pee. She then started to undo the tapes of the diaper. The released smell was
foul. She had to turn Shannon's head to the side in case she ended up throwing up.

Matsuri: "You make me want to hurl." Shannon had really done a number on the diaper that the
mess nearly oozed out. It was disposed of, then she got wiped down, lotioned, then powdered.
Finally a small kangaroo diaper was placed on her. It was incredibly small since it was meant for
a baby and barely fit. There was doubt that it could hold any wetting.

Matsuri: "I can't leave her this exposed. Where can I find clothes? Maybe I should call my supervise
for help. No you stupid idiot. If they see how much I screwed up I'm so fired or even worse
disciplined." She looked through her instructions again for a hint. It contained a map and
a key to a locked door. She looked at Shannon. "I'll be back. Just hang in there."

She goes to a closet shown in the map and is shocked to see that the clothes are very babyish.
There was no underwear only large diapers meant for adults. "Does she need them or..." She
had no time to think about that right now. She grabbed three diapers, socks, and the least childish
pajamas she could find. She then rushed downstairs ready to help.

Matsuri: "Okay miss I'm back. Now let's get you dressed."

Shannon not hearing a word: "Mom I don't want to go to school. I feel..Bwaaa!" She throws up to
the side re-positioning herself to the side. Her eyebrows squint as she poops herself again into
her new diaper. The diaper explodes out with a rock size lump and brown goop oozing out.

Matsuri's face goes green as she rushes to the trash can that Shannon used earlier to hurl into
it herself. This was a very messy job.

So she ended up repeating the wiping and changing process. Due to the heavy use she decided to
triple diapered the poor woman before placing the PJs on. This would keep her warm and comfortable
during the recovery. Despite the body cruelty she had to move Shannon by lifting her by the armpits
and dragging her where her feet ended up skidding on the floor all of the way to the couch. She positioned
her correctly in case of another puking incident. She also place a few blankets on her and a wet washcloth
on her forehead for the fever.

Matsuri gave a sigh of relieve: "Step one complete." She looked around for cleaning supplies and clumsily
tried to clean the pee puddles and puke stain using basic insight from wikipedia. It was the most cleaning
she had ever done without her mom having to nag her to do so.

The next thing was to handle the clothing situation. For that we'll give her a little privacy.

*********
Shannon was slowly waking up to discover her situation. She was still too weak to move but she was
beginning to feel better. If only that were true for her poor legs.

Matsuri: "Stupendous. You're finally awake. You really gave me a hear attack." She was walking
down from the second floor wearing...

Gretel was sound asleep on her work bench. It was a long night at work and she is the type

drooling a little bit in real life.

The dream scenery was Gretel laying on her tummy on a field of sheep wool. She was
dressed in her former Amish wear. She was just chilling out with her old dream pal Garfield.

Gretel yawns: "Yawwwn. I hate Mondays."

Far off in the distant was someone on a monitor looking at the particular dream. It was a woman
dressed in a silk dress covered in stars and moons. Her pink eyes glowed with a warm light
and her hair was green as an untainted forest. Her throne was filled with the the seven colors
of the rainbow glowing in an eternal flow. The woman seemed very confused about this dream.

Luminal: "Huh. I didn't expect her to fall asleep in her dream. I wonder what else is on." She uses
a remote to switch dreams as if she is changing channels on a TV." It had become a regular routine
for her once again after the war on Corruption ended. It was still getting used to ruling a dream kingdom
in peace again.

Luminal: "Better watch the rest of the dream." She went back to Gretel who had apparently switched to
a different scenario in only a minute. She was surrounded by her colleague, family, and animal companions
all wearing sparkly purple uniforms that Gretel had designed. Her boss Gwen was shaking her hand
with sparkles in her eyes.

Dream Gwen: "Gretel you are the best employees Phoenix Pharmacy has ever had. I am proud, no honored
to give you the position of Assistant Manager. This position doubles your pay, reimburses all pet expenses,
2 months paid vacation, and we'll sell whatever you make."

Gretel: "Wow." She was given a plague as an award. Then two clones of the new janitor Alvaro wearing nothing

It's so lonely without those crazy kids." Static was showing on the screen now. "Looks like the dream is over."

Gretel was waking up. What woke her up?

1243111121221111121121121111211122111112.content:
Gretel: “Yaaaaawn!”

She was surrounded by her pets who snuck into her room via her opened window.
Her room was small since this was a one floored building that she had to share rent
with 5 other people. She never got along with them mostly because of her habit of
collecting every stray she could find.

Gretel was raised on a farm on the far off countryside. I wouldn’t call it the stereotypical
Amish settlement but it’s not like they have anything that uses Wi-fi. Her younger brother
weren’t born until she turned 13 so it was usually up to her to help her father with work.
“Raising cattle’s a mans job” her dad would always tell her. Gretel didn’t understand it at the
time but found joy from looking after little things.

She never got along that well with people. She always had trouble at school and the
teachers were ill equipped to help her with dyslexia. She couldn’t relate to other girls because
They helped their mothers and teased her about her short stature. Boys were intimidated by
her strength. One time she tossed a boy twice her size to the other size of class just for pulling her hair.
Still at the end of the day she felt like she had friends when she was with her animals. She had a name and birthday for each one and may have been considered the towns best caretaker.

That is until you have to eat them.

The idea made her so sick that she swore off meat forever. It was one of the reasons she left
home when she turned 20. At least civilization was vegan friendly although maybe not illiterate
friendly.

She had 10 different animals surrounding her in the bed. Two greyhounds were licking her hand. One had a red collar while the other wore a purple collar.She named them Parker and Parker that she said with different tones. It confused the hell out of people but she refused to change their names.

Purring on her lap was a female cherici cat named Snooze because she had never seen her awake. She only appears to move when Gretel looks away.

Near one of her armpits she was cuddling a white rabbit named Mitten. Mitten was always known for getting into trouble which annoyed her neighbors to no end.

Wrapped around her left thigh was her pet snake Winston. “Oh yeah I think Lola used to work at the pet store the day I met you. Good for her for leaving that place.” Winston was a huge cuddler especially around new people.

On her right foot was her pet geico whom she had taken the liberty of naming Mr. Salesman. There was nothing particularly special about this pet although Gretel could never beat it in a staring contest.

Finally nested in her hair were her three bird companions Tweety, Ringtone, and CookBook. Whenever Gretel had something to gossip they are there to spread the news. She has raised each one since they were small hatchlings and were her best friends. If anyone harmed them then they would know Gretel’s wrath. They also made a convenient alarm clock.

Gretel was rubbing the dust out of her eyes. “Mmm. Morning Tweety. Morning Ringtone.. Morning CookBook. PARKER my man. That tickles Parker. Wake up Snooze. You’re so soft Mittens. Little early for work isn’t it Mr. Salesman? Hmm I can’t find Winston.

So gang how do you want to start the day?”
